import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import SubmitButton from '../../../../Components/UI/Button/Button' import { set, useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import * as actionCreators from "../../../../Service/Action/action"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Autocomplete from 'react-autocomplete' const AddFaculty = (props) => { const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors }, reset } = useForm({ mode: "onTouched", }); const [value, setValue] = useState(''); const onSubmit = (data, e) => { e.preventDefault(); } const handleClick = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); props.setTrigger(false); } return (props.trigger) ? (

{errors.Name?.message}

{errors.email?.message}

{errors.subject?.message}

{errors.password?.message}

) : null; } export default AddFaculty
